panels.description: The number of items in the index
panels.title: Index Items Count

panels.description: The number of in-memory hits to the index
panels.title: Cache Hits

panels.description: The number of in-memory misses to the index
panels.title: Cache Misses

panels.description: The amount of memory used by the index
panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: The average latency when scanning the index
panels.title: Average Scan Latency

panels.description: The percentage of the index that is memory resident.  Indexes w/ 0 items are omitted
panels.title: Index Resident Percent

panels.description: The size of the index on disk
panels.title: Disk Size

panels.description: The number of items indexed since the last restart
panels.title: Indexed Documents/sec

panels.description: The number of documents that are pending
panels.title: Pending Documents

panels.description: The number of documents that are queued for indexing
panels.title: Queued Documents

panels.description: The number of requests to the index
panels.title: Num Requests/sec

panels.description: The total data size of the index
panels.title: Data Size

panels.description: The number of records in the index that are in memory
panels.title: Records in Memory

panels.description: The average number of rows returned by a scan
panels.title: Rows Returned/sec

panels.description: The average number of bytes read per scan
panels.title: Scan Bytes Read/sec

panels.description: The number of records not in memory
panels.title: Records on Disk
